titles.title: A bill to provide for the distribution within the United States of the film entitled "America The Way I See It".

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Called up by House Under Suspension of Rules.
Received in the Senate and read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

calendar.text: Committee on Foreign Relations. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Foreign Relations. Reported to Senate by Senator Pell without amendment. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 421.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 10/6/1987--Introduced. Requires the Director of the U.S. Information Agency (USIA) to provide for the distribution within the United States of the USIA film "America The Way I See It."
